languages.text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.
languages.original_text: Персонажи с рукопашным оружием могут совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}, если противник на соседней клетке начинает движение, а также в результате применения некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. Атаку по возможности могут совершать все персонажи с оружием ближнего боя, включая членов вашего отряда. Попадание и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} рассчитываются как обычно.

traits.locale_text:
Characters with melee weapons can make an attack of opportunity if the opponent in the adjacent cell moves away or uses one of their abilities. In this case, the hit and damage are calculated as from a normal attack.
All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attack of opportunity.

Characters with melee weapons can make an attack of opportunity if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some abilities. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attack of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} are calculated just like a normal attack.

Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

languages.text: Персонажи с рукопашным оружием могут совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}, если противник на соседней клетке начинает движение, а также в результате применения некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. Атаку по возможности могут совершать все персонажи с оружием ближнего боя, включая членов вашего отряда. Попадание и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} рассчитываются как обычно.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an attack of opportunity if the opponent in the adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some abilities. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attack of opportunity. The chance to hit and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} are calculated as from a normal attack.

traits.locale_text:
Персонажи с рукопашным оружием могут совершить атаку по возможности, если противник в смежной клетке начинает движение. Также ее могут спровоцировать некоторые способности.
Атаку по возможности могут совершать все персонажи с оружием ближнего боя, включая членов вашего отряда. Шанс попадания и {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} рассчитываются как при обычной атаке.

Персонажи с рукопашным оружием могут совершить атаку по возможности, если противник в смежной клетке начинает движение. Также ее могут спровоцировать некоторые способности.
Атаку по возможности могут совершать все персонажи с оружием ближнего боя, включая членов вашего отряда. Шанс попадания и {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} рассчитываются как при обычной атаке.

languages.text: Los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo pueden realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} si un oponente en una casilla adyacente se mueve. Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} también pueden provocarlo. Todos los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo, incluyendo a los miembros de tu grupo, pueden realizar ataques de oportunidad. La probabilidad de impacto y el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} infligido son los de un ataque normal.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo pueden realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} si un oponente en una casilla adyacente se mueve. Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} también pueden provocarlo. Todos los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo, incluyendo a los miembros de tu grupo, pueden realizar ataques de oportunidad. La probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} infligido son los de un ataque normal.

languages.text: 近接武器を持つキャラクターは、隣接するセルにいる対戦相手が移動を開始した際に、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}できる。機会攻撃は一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によってトリガーされることもある。 部隊のメンバーを含め、近接武器を持つキャラクターはすべて、機会攻撃を行うことができる。 命中率と{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}は通常の攻撃と同じように計算される。
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

traits.locale_text: 近接武器を持つキャラクターは、隣接するセルにいる対戦相手が移動を開始した際に、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}できる。機会攻撃は一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によってトリガーされることもある。 パーティーのメンバーを含め、近接武器を持つキャラクターはすべて、機会攻撃を行うことができる。 {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}率と{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}は通常の攻撃と同じように計算される。

languages.text: 使用近战武器的角色，当周围邻近敌人移动时，可以向移动的敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。部分特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可能也会触发此效果。 所有使用近战武器的角色，包括您队伍中的同伴，都可以发动借机攻击。 借机攻击命中敌人与造成{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}的计算方式与普通攻击相同。
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

traits.locale_text: 使用近战武器的角色，当周围邻近敌人移动时，可以向移动的敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。部分特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可能也会触发此效果。 所有使用近战武器的角色，包括您队伍中的同伴，都可以发动借机攻击。 借机攻击命中敌人与造成{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}的计算方式与普通攻击相同。

languages.text: Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen können einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausführen, wenn sich ein Gegner auf einem angrenzenden Feld bewegt. Dies kann auch durch einige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ausgelöst werden. Alle Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen, einschließlich der Mitglieder deiner Gruppe, können Gelegenheitsangriffe ausführen. Die Chance auf Treffer und {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} wird wie bei einem normalen Angriff berechnet.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

traits.locale_text: Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen können einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausführen, wenn ein Gegner in einem angrenzenden Feld eine Bewegung beginnt. Dies kann auch durch einige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ausgelöst werden. Alle Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen, einschließlich der Mitglieder deiner Gruppe, können einen Gelegenheitsangriff ausführen. Die Chancen auf {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} werden wie bei einem normalen Angriff berechnet.

languages.text: Les personnages dotés d'une arme de mêlée peuvent effectuer une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} si un adversaire situé sur une case adjacente initie un mouvement. Elle peut également être déclenchée par certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Tous les personnages munis d'une arme de mêlée, y compris les membres de votre groupe, peuvent effectuer une attaque d'opportunité. Les chances d'infliger des coups et des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} sont calculées comme pour une attaque normale.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages dotés d'une arme de mêlée peuvent effectuer une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} si un adversaire situé sur une case adjacente initie un mouvement. Elle peut également être déclenchée par certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Tous les personnages munis d'une arme de mêlée, y compris les membres de votre groupe, peuvent effectuer une attaque d'opportunité. Les chances d’{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}infliger des coups{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} sont calculées comme pour une attaque normale.

languages.text: Yakın dövüş silahı olan bir karakter, bitişik hücresindeki bir düşman hareket etmeye başlarsa {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirebilir. Ayrıca, bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} de bu saldırıyı tetikleyebilir. Grubunun üyeleri de dâhil olmak üzere yakın dövüş silahı olan tüm karakterler fırsat saldırısı yapabilir. Vuruş ve {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}hasar{/g} verme olasılığı, normal bir saldırı gibi hesaplanır.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons can make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} if an opponent in an adjacent cell initiates movement. It can also be triggered by some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. All characters with melee weapons, including members of your party, can make attacks of opportunity. The chance to hit and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is calculated just like a normal attack.
